snippet.title: Project Stardust - X-Wing VR - Survival Update (0.89)
snippet.description:
Virtual Reality research project created by Dylan Stout. Download here: https://dylanstout.itch.io/project-stardust 
Music by Samuel Kim (w/permission): https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCuoKuTCQ9dmPIgOgyLm9HgQ

Project Stardust is an X-Wing cockpit simulator created at the University of Utah to study ways to avoid Virtual Reality Sickness. The experience is getting a new game mode "Survival", coming November.  You can learn more about the project and why it was created here: http://saltyhash.org/2019/08/24/project-stardust-x-wing-vr/

DISCLAIMER: This video, the VR experience, and its' contents provide viable research insight into VR sickness correlations. FAIR USE is claimed for the exhibition of copyrighted materials under the premise that the content is being used for educational and research purposes at the University of Utah's Computer Science department.
